mapinfo.detailsText:
Starting next to a crossable section of the Klondike river you will battle to secure additional resources for your colony. 
 Claim the gold in the middle of this region or venture in the forest across the river to seek more sources of food. 
 Try to estabilish your dominance over the long trade route for a long term advantage. 
 
 Native Civs: Nootka 
 Mercenaries: Pistolero / Comanchero 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
